resources.string: A smooth blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a light foam for a perfectly balanced, creamy coffee experience.
A bold and rich espresso shot topped with hot water, creating a full-bodied coffee with a deep flavor.
Espresso layered with steamed milk and rich vanilla syrup, topped with a drizzle of sweet caramel.
A cold, blended coffee drink with a smooth vanilla flavor, topped with whipped cream for a refreshing treat.
A warm combination of espresso and steamed milk, mixed with rich chocolate syrup and finished with whipped cream.
